status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Summary:*
On Android, the {{Ti.Network.HTTPClient}} "file" property can only be set to a {{string}}.
On iOS, the "file" property can be set to a {{string}} or {{Ti.Filesystem.File}} object.

We should add {{File}} object support on Android for parity.

*Community PR:*
https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/10532
fields.summary: Android: Allow Ti.Network.HTTPClient "file" parameter to be set to Ti.Filesystem.File object like iOS

comments.body: FR passed. Jenkin is failing. Waiting for resolving jenkin's failure.
